column4: what program can be used to say... install ubuntu from windows? (just a random Q) like.. does virtual pc let you do that then reboot soley into a linux partition or can you not like vmware? i have nfi
no, its not possible to do it from within Windows. Although you could choose to run it in a virtual machine (like vmware).
20 GB should be enough, 4 GB is minimum required (not including swap).
